# Antonine Rochet - Yoga & Mountain Guide Website

## Project Overview
Nuxt 4 + Nuxt UI + Nuxt Content website for yoga instructor and mountain guide Antonine Rochet.

## Features
- Dual-theme site: Yoga and Mountain activities
- Hero section with 90% width slide interaction (yoga â†” mountain)
- Adaptive navigation based on subsite (yoga/mountain)
- Content-managed pages using Nuxt Content

## Yoga Section Pages
- Le Studio
- Les cours
- Le yoga Iyengar
- L'enseignante
- Les stages

## Tech Stack
- Nuxt 4
- Nuxt UI
- Nuxt Content
- TypeScript
